com.gussssy.gametwo.game.components

Class AABBComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gussssy.gametwo.game.components.Component
      • com.gussssy.gametwo.game.components.AABBComponent

  • public class AABBComponent
extends Component
    AABBComponent. Axis alligned bounding box. Rectanglualr axis alligned hitbox for detecting collisions with other GameObjects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean colliding 
      int collidingColor 
      int color 
      boolean particleCollisionDetectionEnabled 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AABBComponent(GameObject parent)
      Primary Constructor.
      AABBComponent(GameObject parent, int type)
      Secondary constructor for making AABB with different conditions Type 1: no padding Type 2: no padding AND this objects isnt actually moving so will set positon last frame manually, not in the AABB Update - used for Collision Tester Objects which simulate collision wihtout actually moving
      AABBComponent(TileObject parent)
      AABBConstructor for when creating an AABBComponent that will be modiffied later for collision with tiles.
      AABBComponent(TileObject parent, int startTileX, int stopTileX, int startTileY, int stopTileY)
      AABB constructor for temporary/single frame tile hitboxes

      Modify a tileCollision AABB This is only for type 3 AABBs which come from tiles that have collided with a projectile.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AABBComponent

        public AABBComponent(GameObject parent)
        Primary Constructor. - Initial implementation where objects have 'padding'

      • AABBComponent

        public AABBComponent(GameObject parent,
                     int type)
        Secondary constructor for making AABB with different conditions Type 1: no padding Type 2: no padding AND this objects isnt actually moving so will set positon last frame manually, not in the AABB Update - used for Collision Tester Objects which simulate collision wihtout actually moving

      • AABBComponent

        public AABBComponent(TileObject parent,
                     int startTileX,
                     int stopTileX,
                     int startTileY,
                     int stopTileY)
        AABB constructor for temporary/single frame tile hitboxes

      • AABBComponent

        public AABBComponent(TileObject parent)
        AABBConstructor for when creating an AABBComponent that will be modiffied later for collision with tiles. This aabb will not work unless its variables are set by modifyAABB(); Type is set to type 3: temporary AABB for tile collision

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(GameContainer gc,
                   GameManager gm,
                   float dt)
        AABBComponent Update. Recalculate the location of the hitbox for this frame and then add the AABB to Physics for collision detection.
        Specified by:
        update in class Component

      • modifyTileAABBComponent

        public void modifyTileAABBComponent(int startTileX,
                                    int stopTileX,
                                    int startTileY,
                                    int stopTileY)
        Modify a tileCollision AABB This is only for type 3 AABBs which come from tiles that have collided with a projectile.

      • updateAfterCollision

        public void updateAfterCollision()
        Updates an AABB after a collision.

      • render

        public void render(GameContainer gc,
                   Renderer r)
        Renders the AABB. Will only render AABBs when the debug display is active.
        Specified by:
        render in class Component
